name: Naar
description:
This is a result of a schoolproject made in Unreal engine 4, by students from the game design program at Uppsala university (Campus Gotland).

Naar is a third person action-adventure game set in the fantasy world of Al-Dunya, where the evil djinn Iblis has invaded the land of humans. You are Mokhtar, a wizard in training, on the mission to dispatch evil creatures from the land. To do this, you need to discover new powerful spells and use it to your advantage.

You can read more about the project here: http://naarthegame.net/

If the download is slow or dont work, try to download it from one of the alternative links on http://naarthegame.net/
